message.item.tinypipes.pipe_wrench: Right click to configure pipe sides. Left click to remove pipe. Also, can be used with other mods requiring forge pipes.
message.item.tinypipes.item_pipe:
Transfers items between inventory blocks.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
Right click with an empty hand for a GUI.
message.item.tinypipes.item_filter_pipe:
Transfers allowed items between inventory blocks.
Right click with an empty hand to set the filters.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
message.item.tinypipes.fluid_pipe:
Transfers fluids between tanks.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
Right click with an empty hand for a GUI.
message.item.tinypipes.fluid_filter_pipe:
Transfers allowed fluids between tanks.
Right click with an empty hand to set the filters using buckets of fluid.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
message.item.tinypipes.energy_pipe:
Transfers forge energy from source to receiver.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
Right click with an empty hand for a GUI.
message.item.tinypipes.redstone_pipe:
Transfers multiple redstone signals with no signal loss.
Right click connection with a Dye to change frequency.
Output will only output signals from matching colored inputs.
Right click with a wrench to change input and output sides.
Right click with an empty hand for a GUI.
message.item.tinypipes.speed_upgrade:
Use on a full sized pipe connection to increase it's speed by _speed_upgrade_multiplier_x.
Only required on sending pipe and receiving pipe.
Up to _speed_upgrade_max_ upgrades can be applied to multiply the speed increase.
tinypipes.gui.pipe_config.msg.enabled: Enabled: outputs and connects to other pipes
message.item.tiny_pipe: Can be placed on a Tiny Redstone Panel or in world with other tiny components.
